DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study identify whether , adjustment confounders via stratification propensity score adjustment calendar year , combine endpoint consist # 1 # 4 ( 1. switch back Concerta , 2. changing use immediate release [ IR ] methylphenidate , 3. begin new attention deficit hyperactivity disorder [ ADHD ] medication , 4. stop Concerta long act [ LA ] methylphenidate { authorized generic [ AG ] methylphenidate equivalent generic [ EG ] methylphenidate } begin index date ) , differ participant switch brand Concerta EG formulation versus participant switch brand Concerta AG formulation .
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective cohort study base health claim database , Truven Commercial Claims Encounters ( CCAE ) database . Participants enter cohort , use Concerta continuously least 60 day October 3 , 2012 , receive dispense AG EG formulation within 15 day end day Concerta supply . The date dispense AG EG formulation participant index date . This study track various event , example , back-switches , methylphenidate dose change time ( 60 day switch Concerta AG EG generic compare 60 day switch ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female participant 6 65 year age Have database continuously least 183 day June 1 , 2012 Have diagnosis attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) Use Concerta ( brand methylphenidate ) least 60 day receive dispense authorize generic ( AG ) equivalent generic ( EG ) formulation within 15 day end day Concerta supply .
